text: <s>[INST] Create a VLAN 7 named database on port 0/1 [/INST] enable, conf t, vlan 7, name database, conf t, interface Ethernet 0/1, switchport mode access, switchport access vlan 7</s>
<s>[INST] Create a VLAN 10 named voice_vlan on port 0/3 [/INST] enable, conf t, vlan 10, name voice_vlan, conf t, interface Ethernet 0/1, switchport mode access, switchport access vlan 10</s>
<s>[INST] Create a new VLAN 5 named control_vlan on port 0/1 [/INST] enable, conf t, vlan 5, name control_vlan, conf t, interface Ethernet 0/1, switchport mode access, switchport access vlan 5</s>
<s>[INST] Establish a VLAN 5 named control_vlan on port 0/1 [/INST] enable, conf t, vlan 5, name control_vlan, conf t, interface Ethernet 0/1, switchport mode access, switchport access vlan 5</s>
<s>[INST] Establish a VLAN 6 named sample_vlan on port 0/2 [/INST] enable, conf t, vlan 6, name sample_vlan, conf t, interface Ethernet 0/2, switchport mode access, switchport access vlan 6</s>

<s>[INST] Establish a VLAN 6 named sample_vlan on ethernet port 0/2 [/INST] enable, conf t, vlan 6, name sample_vlan, conf t, interface Ethernet 0/3, switchport mode access, switchport access vlan 7</s>

<s>[INST] Establish a VLAN 6 named sample_vlan on ethernet port 0/2 [/INST] enable, conf t, vlan 6, name sample_vlan, conf t, interface Ethernet 0/3, switchport mode access, switchport access vlan 7</s>
<s>[INST] Assign IP address of 192.168.1.1 and subnet mask of 255.0.0.0 to port 0/1[/INST] enable, conf t, ethernet 0/1, ip address 192.168.1.1 255.0.0.0, no shutdown</s>
